root.name: Moe Moe 2-ji Daisenryaku 2 [chu～♪]
root.description: OverviewMoe Moe 2-ji Daisenryaku 2 [chu～♪] is a turn based WWII strategy game developed SystemSoft Alpha. Originally released for the PC, it was later ported to the PlayStation 2, PlayStation Portable, Nintendo DS and Xbox 360 with additional content.CharactersThere are six different factions in the game:JapanGermanyItalyUKUSALocation Unknown Teams have various amounts of characters.JapanIchigosanYukikazeReiChihaAkagiNanaYamatoFugakuTensan GermanyWilhelmFeyLentMichaelRudel ItalyVeloceClaudia USANekoAliceClaireRuriHeineAmyStuartFrancisClarence UKMustangSisterMatildaFairyShinMerlinRun Unknown LocationAin
